A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good looking movie\, but definitely not a Star Wars movie. I was so dissapointed with this I had to reflect on it for about a week afterwards just to make sure there wasn't in fact something wrong with ME. But no\, it was the movie. Subversion just for subversion's sake\, especially in a much loved and cherished film series\, is a BAD idea. I hope you're happy Rian\, you just made J.J. Abrams job harder than it needed to be. There are so many plot holes\, inconsistencies\, and pointless writing in this film I don't know how this trilogy can recover.
